description:

The Legacy of Afnan Perfumes

Afnan Perfumes, established in the UAE, has earned its reputation for creating best-selling fragrances that blend Middle Eastern perfumery traditions with contemporary sensibilities. The Turathi collection represents their commitment to crafting sophisticated scents that honor heritage while embracing modernity.

When to Wear Turathi Homme Blue

This versatile new arrival fragrance is perfect for professional settings, special occasions, or casual outings. Its refreshing profile makes it an excellent choice for spring and summer, though its warm base notes ensure it performs admirably year-round.

Frequently Asked Question

How does Turathi Homme Blue compare to other popular blue fragrances?

While many designer blue fragrances focus solely on freshness, Turathi Homme Blue offers a more complex experience. It begins with the expected aquatic freshness but evolves into a sophisticated woody-amber base that provides greater depth and longevity than typical blue fragrances. The addition of distinctive Middle Eastern accords gives it a unique character that stands apart from mainstream offerings.
